title: 111_s2071
content: CERTAIN IMAGING COLORANTS. Subchapter II of chapter 99 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States is amended by inserting new headings. "9902.01.00 Aryl substituted pyrazonyl, sodium salt (PMN No. P03-78) and Substituted naphthalene, potassium/sodium salt (PMN No. P04-390) provided for in subheading 3215.11.00." Copper phthalocyanine substituted with sulphonic acids and alkyl sulphonoamides, sodium/ammonium salts (PMN No. P02-893) under subheading 3215.19.00. Copper phthalocyanine substituted with sulphonic acids and alkyl sulphonoamides, sodium salts (CAS No. 90295-11-7) under subheading 3215.19.00 remains unchanged (9902.01.00). Copper phthalocyanine substituted with sulphonic acids and alkyl sulphonoamides, sodium salts (CAS No. 90295-11-7) under subheading 3215.19.00 remains unchanged (9902.01.00). Carboxyphenylene, lithium salt (PMN No. P-00-351) under subheading 3215.11.00 also remains unchanged (9902.01.00). Copper phthalocyanine substituted with sulphonic acids and alkyl sulphonoamides, sodium salts (CAS No. 90295-11-7) remains unchanged under subheading 3215.19.00 (9902.01.00). Aminoalkyl triazinediylbis substituted phenylene azo sodium salt (CAS No. 50925-42-3) also remains unchanged under the same subheading (9902.01.00). 9902.01.00 includes sodium salts of carboxyphenylene and amino benzoic acid, as well as chloro-substituted naphthalene compounds. Aryl [Substituted phenylazo] pyridine, sodium/lithium salt (PMN No. P-02-234) provided for in subheading 3215.19.00, with no changes before 12/31/2011. The effective date for the amendment applies to articles entered or withdrawn from warehouse for consumption after the 15th day following the enactment of the Act.
